Text.Name: Gong_5_Tu
Text.Desc: Thousands of years ago, earth was forced to separate from heaven, causing a depletion of Qi in the human realm, and ascension became impossible. Out of desperation, a cultivator with a rare gift discovered an unusual way and created this Law. It does not rely on the environment, but will cost one's life energy to breakthrough. Therefore, only a person with the healthiest body and various rare medicines to prolong their lifespan can cultivate in this Law.
Text.SelectDesc: One will excel in guarding skills. As long as the Golden Core meets the requirement, the breakthroughing will be successful. However, it will cost a great portion of lifespan during cultivation. Are you sure you want to follow this Law?
